<style>
.header-bar {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 1em 0;
}

.header-title {
  flex-grow: 1;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 2em;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin: 0;
}

iframe.pdf-reader {
  width: 100%;
  height: 90vh;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
}
</style>

<div class="header-bar">
  <a href="index.html" class="btn">‚Üê Back</a>
  <h1 class="header-title">Airbnb Sentiment Application & Hosting Strategy</h1>
  <select id="pdf-selector" style="width: 200px; font-size: 1em; padding: 4px;">
    <option value="project-airbnb.pdf">Paper</option>
    <option value="project-airbnb-presentation.pdf">Presentation</option>
    <option value="404.html">App Demo</option>
  </select>
</div>

<iframe 
  id="pdf-frame"
  class="pdf-reader"
  src="project-airbnb.pdf" 
  title="Airbnb Sentiment">
</iframe>

<script>
  const selector = document.getElementById('pdf-selector');
  const iframe = document.getElementById('pdf-frame');

  selector.addEventListener('change', function () {
    iframe.src = this.value;
  });
</script>
